courses.title: Bachata sensual for the beginners
courses.description: Bachata Sensual was made popular in Spain. Bachata Sensual is a mix between dance and theatre with strict follow and lead principles. The dance is an interpretation of the music with mostly circular movements and body waves.

courses.title: Salsa LA
courses.description: In many styles of salsa dancing, as a dancer shifts their weight by stepping, the upper body remains level and nearly unaffected by the weight changes. Weight shifts cause the hips to move.

community.heroTitle: Learn to dance with enthusiastic teachers from Bailemos Amsterdam
community.heroSubtitle: Join our online courses and learn whenever and wherever it suits you or book a private lesson with one of our professional teachers.
community.linkText: Want to know more about Bailemos Amsterdam? Check our website.
